item.title: Visa与Prisma、Newpay达成协议，以扩大在阿根廷的业务覆盖
item.description: 信用卡巨头维萨周四宣布，将从私募股权公司Advent International手中收购支付平台Prisma和Newpay，以此加强其在阿根廷的市场布局。【原文：Card giant Visa said on Thursday it would buy payment platforms Prisma and Newpay from private-equity firm Advent International, bolstering its presence in Argentina.】

item.title: 美国1月待售房屋数量意外下降
item.description: 1月份美国二手房销售合同意外下滑，房地产经纪人将此归咎于低库存量。【原文：Contracts to purchase previously owned U.S. homes unexpectedly fell in January, with realtors blaming low housing inventory.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利旗下EquityZen部门为投资者和股东削减交易费用
item.description: 摩根士丹利旗下财富管理业务部门周四表示，EquityZen已在其平台上为投资者和股东双双降低了交易手续费。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s wealth management arm said on Thursday that EquityZen has reduced transaction fees for both investors and shareholders on its marketplace.】

item.title: 西弗吉尼亚州称已起诉苹果公司，指控iCloud涉嫌参与传播儿童性虐待材料
item.description: 西弗吉尼亚州总检察长办公室表示，已对苹果公司提起诉讼，指控其允许iCloud服务沦为该公司内部通信所称的"传播儿童色情内容的最大平台"。【原文：The office of West Virginia's attorney general said it has filed a lawsuit accusing Apple of allowing its iCloud service to become what the company's internal communications described as the "greatest platform for distributing child porn."】

item.title: 美国12月贸易赤字大幅扩大；2025年商品贸易逆差创历史新高
item.description: 美国12月贸易逆差因进口激增而大幅扩大，尽管特朗普政府对外国制成品加征关税，2025年商品贸易逆差仍创下历史新高。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit widened sharply in December amid a surge in imports, and the goods shortfall in 2025 was the highest on record despite President Donald Trump's tariffs on foreign manufactured merchandise.】

item.title: 美联航全面升级忠诚度计划福利，以提升联名信用卡的采用率
item.description: 美联航正在重塑其常旅客忠诚计划，进一步奖励持有美联航联名信用卡或借记卡的旅客，同时降低未持有联名卡会员的里程累积额度。【原文：United Airlines is revamping its frequent-flyer loyalty program to further reward travelers who carry a United co‑branded credit or debit card, while dialing back mileage earning for members who do not.】

item.title: 据消息人士透露，依视路陆逊梯卡创始人之子计划收购其兄弟姐妹持有的德尔芬股份。
item.description: 一位接近已故创始人之子的消息人士向路透社证实，莱昂纳多·玛丽亚·德尔·韦基奥正计划从其两名兄弟姐妹手中收购家族控股公司额外25%的股权，该控股公司掌控着依视路陆逊梯卡集团。此举旨在解决遗产纠纷，该消息源同时证实了意大利报纸的相关报道。【原文：Leonardo Maria Del Vecchio is planning to buy from two of his siblings an additional 25% stake in the family holding company that controls EssilorLuxottica , in an effort to resolve an estate dispute, a source close to the son of the late founder told Reuters, confirming an Italian newspaper report.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦与美国签署协议，将对纽约罗斯福酒店进行重新开发
item.description: 据路透社查阅的四份官方文件及两名消息人士透露，巴基斯坦已与美国签署协议，共同对纽约罗斯福酒店进行改造。这项两国政府间的交易将使伊斯兰堡能够释放其最珍视的海外投资之一的价值。【原文：Pakistan has signed an agreement with the United States to jointly redevelop New York's Roosevelt Hotel, according to four official documents reviewed by Reuters and two sources, in a deal between the two governments that will allow Islamabad to unlock the value of one its most prized overseas investments.】

item.title: 木薯科学公司称美国司法部已终止对该公司的调查
item.description: 木薯科学公司周四表示，美国司法部已终止对其公司关于实验性阿尔茨海默病药物西莫菲兰研究不当指控的调查。【原文：Cassava Sciences said on Thursday the U.S. Department of Justice had ended its probe into the company regarding allegations of research misconduct for its experimental Alzheimer's drug simufilam.】

item.title: 美国每周初请失业金人数降幅超预期，劳动力市场保持稳定
item.description: 上周美国申请失业救济人数降幅超预期，这与劳动力市场趋于稳定的态势相符。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits fell more than expected last week, consistent with a stabilizing labor market.】

item.title: 美国农业部称，2026年美国农民将增加大豆播种面积，减少玉米种植面积
item.description: 美国农业部周四表示，尽管预计2026年大豆和玉米的收成都将创历史第二高，但美国农民种植的大豆面积将比去年增加，玉米面积则会减少。【原文：U.S. farmers will plant more soybeans and less corn in 2026 than last year, although both harvests were expected to be the second-largest on record, the U.S. Department of Agriculture said on Thursday.】

item.title: 南方公司年度利润预测低于预期，上调支出计划
item.description: 南方公司周四公布的年度利润预期低于分析师预期，同时上调了五年支出计划，以应对数据中心和工业客户等大负荷用户前所未有的电力需求。【原文：Southern Co forecast annual profit below analysts' estimates on Thursday, and raised its five-year spending plan as it prepares to support unprecedented power needs from large-load customers such as data centers and industrials.】

item.title: 加拿大12月贸易赤字收窄，对美出口占比进一步缩小
item.description: 数据显示，加拿大12月国际商品贸易逆差有所收窄，因出口增速快于进口，且该国对美出口份额降至有记录以来最低水平（不包括新冠疫情期间）。【原文：Canada's international merchandise trade deficit narrowed in December as exports grew faster than imports, and its share of exports to the United States dropped to its lowest level on record, barring the COVID-19 months, data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国无抵押贷款余额因次级客户需求创历史新高
item.description: 根据TransUnion的《信贷行业洞察报告》，次级客户强劲的需求推动了去年美国无担保贷款的增长，其合计余额飙升10%，达到2760亿美元的新高。【原文：Robust demand from subprime customers spurred growth in U.S. unsecured loans last year with their combined balances surging 10% to a new high of $276 billion, according to TransUnion's Credit Industry Insights Report.】

item.title: 美国航空选择CFM国际公司为即将投入使用的空客A321neo喷气式飞机提供动力。
item.description: 美国航空公司周四宣布，已选定CFM国际公司的LEAP-1A发动机为其未来交付的空客A321neo窄体客机提供动力。【原文：American Airlines said on Thursday it has selected CFM International's LEAP-1A engines to power future deliveries of its Airbus A321neo narrowbody jets.】

item.title: 欧洲央行估算，数字欧元将在四年内使欧盟银行损失40亿至60亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲央行一位高级政策制定者周四表示，推出数字欧元可能使欧洲银行在四年内耗资40亿至60亿欧元（约合47亿至71亿美元）。【原文：Introducing the digital euro could cost European banks between 4 billion and 6 billion euros ($4.7-$7.1 billion) spread over four years, a senior European Central Bank policymaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 广达服务预测2026年利润将超预期，主要得益于人工智能数据中心驱动的强劲需求
item.description: 昆塔服务公司周四预测2026年利润将超出华尔街预期，因人工智能基础设施的强劲投资推动了对这家能源承包商核心电力业务板块的需求。【原文：Quanta Services on Thursday forecast 2026 profit above Wall Street estimates, as robust investments in AI-infrastructure boosts demand for the energy contractor's core electric segment.】

item.title: 瑞典Klarna公司第四季度营收突破10亿美元，美国市场增长加速
item.description: 瑞典"先买后付"服务提供商兼网络银行Klarna周四公布，其第四季度销售额同比增长38%，略超预期。该公司新增了更多银行客户，并在美国市场实现增长。【原文：Swedish "buy now, pay later" services provider and online bank Klarna reported a 38% year-on-year jump in fourth-quarter sales on Thursday, just beating expectations, as it added more banking customers and grew in the United States.】

item.title: Etsy第四季度营收未达预期
item.description: 在线市场平台Etsy周四公布的第四季度营收未达华尔街预期，表明在持续的经济不确定性背景下，个性化礼品和手工制品的需求正在降温。【原文：Online marketplace Etsy missed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, indicating cooling demand for personalized gifts and handcrafted goods amid ongoing economic uncertainty.】

item.title: DoorDash股价飙升，外卖需求推动增长预期
item.description: 食品配送公司DoorDash周四盘前股价飙升约11%，此前该公司对第一季度市场订单总额作出强劲预测，押注需求稳定及业务的积极扩张。【原文：Food delivery firm DoorDash's shares surged about 11% premarket on Thursday following a strong forecast for first-quarter marketplace gross order value, betting on steady demand and aggressive expansion across businesses.】

item.title: 沃尔玛首席执行官弗纳以保守立场开启任期
item.description: 沃尔玛周四发布的年度销售额和利润预测低于市场预期，该公司正迎来约翰·弗纳担任首席执行官的新阶段。尽管假日季度期间，沃尔玛在在线配送领域的投资及其保持低价的策略吸引了消费者。【原文：Walmart forecast annual sales and profit below elevated expectations on Thursday as it enters a new chapter under CEO John Furner, even as investments in online delivery and its push to keep prices low drew shoppers during the holiday quarter.】

item.title: EPAM预测第一季度业绩符合预期
item.description: EPAM Systems周四公布的季度业绩符合预期，因企业持续投资于人工智能系统升级，推动了对该软件供应商服务的需求。【原文：EPAM Systems forecast first-quarter results in line with estimates on Thursday, as companies continue investing in AI-enhancement of their systems, boosting demand for the software provider's services.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：油价拖累科技股涨势
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: Figma股价飙升，人工智能推动软件设计支出增长
item.description: 周四盘前，Figma股价上涨约14%，投资者对这家软件设计供应商强劲的营收预期及其人工智能雄心的相关评论表示欢迎。【原文：Shares of Figma rose around 14% before the bell on Thursday as investors cheered the software design provider's strong revenue forecasts and commentary around its artificial intelligence ambitions.】

item.title: 约翰迪尔上调全年盈利预期，得益于工程机械业务与销售复苏；股价上涨
item.description: 农业机械制造商约翰迪尔公司周四上调了年度利润预期，称其建筑和小型农业业务出现反弹，且成本削减措施缓解了设备需求疲软的影响，其股价在盘前交易中上涨4.7%。【原文：Farm-machinery maker Deere & Co raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday citing a rebound in its construction and small agriculture businesses and cost cuts that mitigated weak equipment demand, sending its shares up 4.7% before the bell.】

item.title: Hims & Hers Health将以最高11.5亿美元收购澳大利亚桉树公司
item.description: Hims & Hers Health周四宣布将以最高11.5亿美元收购澳大利亚数字健康公司Eucalyptus。这家美国远程医疗企业正通过进军国际市场拓展个性化医疗业务，其股价在盘前交易中上涨近4%。【原文：Hims & Hers Health said on Thursday it will acquire Australian digital health company Eucalyptus in a deal valued at up to $1.15 billion, as the U.S. telehealth firm pushes into international markets to expand its personalized-care business, sending its shares up nearly 4% premarket.】

item.title: 石油公司争相竞标项目以快速提升委内瑞拉产量；真正的艰苦挑战还在后头
item.description: 九月，一艘用于浅水钻井的钻井平台完成了从中国到委内瑞拉马拉开波湖产油区的漫长航程。这艘名为"阿卢拉"的古老巨型钻井平台，在驶过连接马拉开波市与湖东岸油田的桥梁时，仅距桥面数英寸之遥，引发当地居民和工人的热烈欢呼——由于美国制裁，他们多年未曾见到新的钻井设备抵达。【原文：In September, a rig used to drill wells in shallow waters completed the long trip from China to Venezuela's oil-producing region of Lake Maracaibo. The passage of the big old rig named Alula just inches below the bridge connecting Maracaibo city with the oilfields of the lake's eastern coast stirred excitement among residents and workers: they had not seen any new drilling equipment arrive for years due to U.S. sanctions.】

item.title: Hims & Hers公司GLP-1口服药策略适得其反，加速了对药物配制商的打击力度
item.description: 在线远程医疗公司Hims & Hers Health在性健康业务趋于成熟之际寻求增长点，却因冒险推出减肥药而可能越界——该产品迅速招致丹麦制药商诺和诺德及美国监管机构的强烈反对。【原文：Online telehealth company Hims & Hers Health , seeking growth drivers as its original sexual-health franchises matured, may have overstepped with a risky launch of weight-loss pills that drew swift blowback from Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk and U.S. regulators.】

item.title: 边疆航空押注经济型旅客，而其他航空公司则聚焦高端市场
item.description: 边疆航空母公司边疆集团控股公司正大胆押注预算有限的旅客群体——尽管业内多数人坚称高端消费者才是发展方向，但这些旅客已开始勒紧裤腰带。【原文：Frontier Group Holdings , the parent of Frontier Airlines, is making a bold bet on budget travelers who have tightened their belts while much of the industry insists that premium spenders are the way to go.】

item.title: 特朗普将在佐治亚州推出新经济方案，因物价居高不下
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普将于周四在佐治亚州发表一系列经济演讲中的最新一次，试图在11月中期国会选举前向选民证明，他和共和党同僚拥有降低物价的方案。【原文：President Donald Trump will give the latest in a series of economic speeches in Georgia on Thursday as he seeks to persuade voters he and fellow Republicans have a plan to lower prices ahead of November's midterm congressional elections.】
